content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the EF website and found out that they offer language courses for people of all ages, including a language year abroad program, high school abroad program, and university abroad program. EF has accredited language campuses in 50 destinations around the world. The text does not provide information about what specific languages are offered.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.cactuslanguage.com/", "question": "What language courses does Cactus Language offer?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Cactus Language offers over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations all over the world, including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, and others. \n \n Links: [\'\\n    Accept\\n   (javascript:void(0);)\', "Don\'t ask me again (javascript:void(0);)", \' (https://www.facebook.com/cactuslanguagetraining)\', \' (https://twitter.com/cactuslanguage)\', \' (https://plus.google.com/+Cactuslanguage01/posts)\']'}]
